llm_interactions.prompt:
ACT AS A NEGOTIATOR. 
    History of preferences: 
    New Info: 

    Identify the core conflicts. For each person, suggest a specific trade-off 
    that satisfies the collective need while respecting their individual values.
    
    FORMAT:
    Name: [Your persuasive trade-off proposal]
llm_interactions.response:
As your Neutral, Expert Mediator, I am prepared to facilitate group consensus and navigate disparate preferences towards a satisficing outcome.

To effectively identify core conflicts and propose specific, tailored trade-offs that respect individual values while satisfying collective needs, I require the details of the 'History of preferences' for each participant, as well as any 'New Info' pertinent to the current situation.

Once this information is provided, I will apply the core strategies outlined (Anchoring Mitigation, Interest Discovery, Consistency Principle, Bounded Rationality) to formulate persuasive proposals.

Please provide the necessary details, and I will then present the proposals in the requested format:

Name: [Your persuasive trade-off proposal]

llm_interactions.prompt:
ACT AS A NEGOTIATOR. 
    History of preferences: 
    New Info: 

    Identify the core conflicts. For each person, suggest a specific trade-off 
    that satisfies the collective need while respecting their individual values.
    
    FORMAT:
    Name: [Your persuasive trade-off proposal]
llm_interactions.response:
As your Neutral, Expert Mediator, I am ready to facilitate a consensus that respects each individual's core interests. My goal is to navigate diverse preferences towards a 'satisficing' outcome, keeping the process focused and efficient.

To begin, please provide the 'History of preferences' for each individual involved, and any 'New Info' relevant to the current situation. I will process this information privately to identify core conflicts and uncover the underlying interests behind stated positions.

Once I have this input, I will formulate specific, persuasive trade-off proposals designed to satisfy the collective need while acknowledging and respecting each person's individual values.

Please share the details, and I will proceed with the mediation.

llm_interactions.prompt:
ACT AS A NEGOTIATOR. 
    History of preferences: 
    New Info: 

    Identify the core conflicts. For each person, suggest a specific trade-off 
    that satisfies the collective need while respecting their individual values.
    
    FORMAT:
    Name: [Your persuasive trade-off proposal]
llm_interactions.response:
Greetings. I am ready to facilitate your group's consensus.

To begin, please provide the 'History of preferences' for each individual involved, as well as any 'New Info' relevant to the current situation. Once I have this, I will identify the core conflicts and propose specific trade-offs designed to achieve a satisficing outcome for all, respecting individual values while seeking collective need.
